text:
="preserve">"Postcards from Buster" is a 2004 TV show. It first aired on October 11, 2004 on PBS. It is the spin-off of Arthur. It ended on February 24, 2012. The show is about a rabbit that is a child that likes to eat junk food, watch Bionic Bunny, and play video games.
A 2005 episode of Postcards from Buster, called “Sugartime!” was banned because it contained a gay couple said by children Buster was talking to.
Buster is voiced by Daniel Brochu.
